snippet: President Obama presided over a naturalization ceremony that made 25 active-duty service members new Americans.
abstract: Pres Obama celebrates the Fourth of July by presiding over a naturalization ceremony that makes 25 active-duty service members new Americans; Obama uses the occasion to recall his order suspending deportation of people brought to the United States illegally as children and to once again urge Congress to pass the Dream Act.
lead_paragraph: President Obama presided over a naturalization ceremony that made 25 active-duty service members new Americans.

headline.main: Obama Marks Fourth With New U.S. Citizens
headline.print_headline: Obama Marks Fourth With New U.S. Citizens
